alert.note: Alert for St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 3:15PM CDT until July 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL ST. TAMMANY PARISH... At 312 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Covington, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Covington and Abita Springs. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 54 and 65. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A funnel cloud was reported with this storm. Conditions today remain favoritable for weak, tropical funnel clouds. If you see a funnel cloud, seek shelter indoors and wait for the storm to pass. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
